 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קֳבֵל‎</span><sub>29</sub> **substantive** ==front, as== **preposition** ==in front of, before, because of==; followed by <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span> as **conjunction** ==because that== (perhaps in form a diminutive, [[BDB#Bev|Bev]]<sup>[[Dan.2.8|Dan 2:8]]</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְבֵיל‎</span>, with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְ‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לִקְבֵיל‎</span>, suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְקִבֵלִי‎</span>, etc., ***in front of*** ([[BDB#Dalm|Dalm]]<sup>§ 47, 7</sup>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***aspect***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***in front***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, suffix <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***in front (of), opposite (to)***, compare [[Gen.15.10|Gen 15:10]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לקבל‎</span> ***before*** ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>321</sup>, compare193)); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָקֳבֵל‎</span> [[Dan.2.8|Dan 2:8]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְקָבְלָךְ‎</span> [[Dan.2.31|Dan 2:31]] — 

**1.** with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לְ‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** [[Dan.3.3|Dan 3:3]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צַלְמָא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לק‎</span> ***before the image***, [[Dan.2.31|Dan 2:31]]; [[Dan.5.1|Dan 5:1]]; [[Dan.5.5|Dan 5:5]] ***in view of, by reason of***, [[Dan.5.10|Dan 5:10]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַלְכָּא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִלֵּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לק‎</span> ***by reason of*** the words, etc., [[Ezra.4.16|Ezra 4:16]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לָקֳבֵל דְּנָה‎</span> (compare Egyptian Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎לקבל זנה זי‎</span>, RES<sup>361 B5</sup>). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** followed by <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span> as **conjunction** ***because that*** [[Ezra.6.13|Ezra 6:13]] (so Palmyrene [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>ii. 164</sup>). 

**2.** with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כֹּל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּלקֳֿבֵל‎</span> ***in view of, because of*** (but read probably <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כְּלָקֳבֵל‎</span> ***according to the front of***, i.e. ***having regard to, because of :*** [[BDB#Luz|Luzz]]<sup>Chald. Gr. § 123</sup> Lambert<sup>RÉJ, 1895, 47 f.</sup> [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]<sup>§ 95 d</sup> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>LCB, 1896, 703</sup> [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>OLZ, 1902, 487</sup> Str<sup>56</sup> and others; compare Biblical Hebrew I.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֻמָּה‎</span> **d**): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** as **preposition** <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּלקֳֿבֵל דְּנָה‎</span> ***because of this, therefore***, [[Dan.2.12|Dan 2:12]]; [[Dan.2.24|Dan 2:24]]; [[Dan.3.7|Dan 3:7]]; [[Dan.3.8|Dan 3:8]]; [[Dan.6.10|Dan 6:10]]; [[Ezra.7.17|Ezra 7:17]]; [[Dan.3.22|Dan 3:22]] pointing forwards, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּלקֳֿבֵל דִּנָה דִּנָה מִןדִּֿי וג‎</span> ***on this account***, (namely) because that, etc. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** followed by <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דִּי‎</span> as **conjunction** ***because that, inasmuch as***, [[Dan.2.8|Dan 2:8]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כָּלקֳֿבֵל (כְּלָקֳבֵל) דִּי חֲזֵיתוּן‎</span> ***because*** ye see, v[[Dan.2.10|Dan 2:10]] v[[Dan.2.41|Dan 2:41]] v[[Dan.2.45|Dan 2:45]] +, [[Ezra.4.14|Ezra 4:14]]; [[Ezra.7.14|Ezra 7:14]]; [[Dan.5.22|Dan 5:22]] = ***although.*** In [[Dan.2.40|Dan 2:40]]; [[Dan.6.11|Dan 6:11]] taken by [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] (<span class="bdbLangGreek">ὂν τρόπον</span>, <span class="bdbLangGreek">καθώς</span>), [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]], not Lex), [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] as = ***according as*** (as [[Eccl.5.15|Eccl 5:15]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כל קבל דאתא‎</span> ***according as*** he came), but not [[BDB#Bev|Bev]] [[BDB#Behrm|Behrm]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]. [Occasionally in [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], usually = ***before***; compare in <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> [[Gen.28.17|Gen 28:17]]; [[Gen.31.32|Gen 31:32]], [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>§§ 47.7; 50</sup>].
